name: AI Security Platform For CPS System
description: Platform for comprehensive security analysis of AI-Stack of Autonomous Vehicles, Robot, UAV and other AI-based CPS systems

name: CryptoMagnifier
description: A static analysis tool to detect cryptographic misuse bugs in IoT firmware images

name: AESS
description: The AESS (Android EcoSystem Security) project implements a large-scale comprehensive measurement of the security of the Android ecosystem
